document.full_text: short is sweet at augusta national, where a fine touch around the greens often spells success, though holder phil mickelson is prepared to hit the ball long and hard at the masters this week.
document.title: mickelson will take a hard swing at augusta repeat
lines_and_colors: short is sweet at augusta national, where a fine touch around the greens often spells success, though holder phil mickelson is prepared to hit the ball long and hard at the masters this week.
